scripts.build:ui: test -d src/ui && esbuild src/ui/*.js --bundle --format=esm --platform=browser --splitting --external:lit --outdir=dist/ui --log-level=info || echo 'skip: no src/ui'
scripts.build:services: test -d src/services && esbuild src/services/index.js --bundle --format=esm --platform=node --splitting --outdir=dist/services --log-level=info || echo 'skip: no src/services'
scripts.build:shared: test -d src/shared && esbuild src/shared/index.js --bundle --format=esm --platform=browser --splitting --outdir=dist/shared --log-level=info || echo 'skip: no src/shared'
scripts.build: npm i && rm -rf dist && npm run build:ui && npm run build:services && npm run build:shared
scripts.build:dev: npm run dev:ui && npm run dev:services && npm run dev:shared
scripts.examples: npm i --prefix examples && npm run build --prefix examples && npm start --prefix examples
